title: Tour Daily Podcast, stage 20: And now, to Paris
content:
Tour Daily Podcast, stage 20: And now, to Paris

The 20th stage of the Tour de France has concluded and the general classification battle is over. The final time trial was as eventful as a typical time trial is, and Ronan and Caley wondered around the start to check out whatever new tech was on display.

Find the Equals CyclingTips x The Cyclists’ Alliance x Black Sheep kit here.
